course.subject: IELM
course.name: Quality and Process Improvement
course.description: Quality management focuses not only on quality control and assurance, but also on quality improvement.  The emphasis of this course is on systematic and data-driven problem solving techniques such as Six Sigma, DMAIC (define-measure-analyze-improve control) methodology, Total Quality Management, and Lean, as means of continuous process improvement.  Applications across a wide range of manufacturing and service industries.
